WorkItem.Description:
I have just purchased this item (Mark of Supremacy) from the vendor in Dalaran. As you can see here http://www.wowhead.com/?item=47734 it has also a "Use: Increases attack power by 1024 for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)". This last part does not appear in Rawr even if I refresh item info several times.
Please fix it as it's the best trinket you can buy for a Mage.
Also I noticed the parsing problem when reloading items ... but I see it's already scheduled into a new release. 
Great work, guys, keep it up! Your tool is the best!

Comments.Message:
Why would a mage buy Mark of Supremacy over Shard of the Crystal Heart? http://www.wowhead.com/?item=48722 (Haste instead of AP on use)

Attack Power doesn't show up in the mage model because mages do not use attack power.
Wait, did you just say you bought an AP trinket for a Mage?
